Articles.Content:
I decided to join the form at last !

I started to play KSP when it's 0.18.2!

I hope to learn more here

Welcome to the forums Deep Space! I would usually say to check out the Tutorial section to learn more, but due to the recent forum implosion we are still in the process of rebuilding it. Creating a new thread to ask a specific questionm or checking out YouTube videos is probably the best place to learn right now.

Happy Engineering,

Rich

I'm just as addicted to the forum as the game these days. 0.16 was my first version i think. Welcome m8, heaps of fun and learning on the forum. Some of the video and tutorial links in here have been really helpful and entertaining for me. Never would have got free of Kerbin without some forum research.
